name: The Seven Heroes and the Mysterious Tower
name_original: The Seven Heroes and the Mysterious Tower
description:
Hakusura replay RPG where seven heroes challenge the mysterious tower

The Seven Heroes challenge the towering "Tower of Wonders"!

All battles proceed automatically, so
All you can do as a player is to earnestly make the Seven Heroes stronger!

However, one battle must end in [20 seconds*]!

Purchasing equipment, getting from treasure chests,
Let's capture the speed battle by making full use of items and skills!
